revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Chargestone Cave |image = [[File:Chargestone Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Chargestone Cave. |tokens = 186,500 |location = Unova Route 6 }} '''Chargestone Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 3,403,000 HP.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats==
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
